results.name: Star Citizen
results.description:
Welcome to the Star Citizen installer maintained by the Star Citizen LUG!
Before continuing, please see our Quick Start Guide:
https://github.com/starcitizen-lug/information-howtos/wiki

For help with the installer or to just hang out, we invite Linux Star Citizen players to join us: https://robertsspaceindustries.com/orgs/LUG/
results.notes:
Performance may be choppy for the first couple minutes after visiting a new place or performing a new activity while shaders compile. Subsequent arrival should not be choppy.

If you receive a Runtime Error you can continue using Star Citizen by dragging the dialog box to the side, but in-game VoIP and FoIP will cease to function until Star Citizen is restarted. Drop in to the LUG group's chat and forums; we have custom runners to work around this problem.

Please make sure you have all Wine dependencies properly installed or your game may crash during start-up. See our wiki linked above for more information and instructions.

To prevent crashes in areas with lots of geometry, the game needs a Linux resource limit named "vm.max_map_count" increased. If you are following our Quick Start Guide and using our LUG Helper, the Preflight Check will do this for you. To set it manually, execute:

sudo sysctl -w vm.max_map_count=16777216

Consult your distro's documentation on how to set this permanently or ask a LUG member.

See you in the 'verse!
